ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Digest Number 118
ygData.msgSnippet: you can t resize armor once it s made :o/ only thing I know of that can be resized is Crafted Armor (Warrior Quest stuff) and that s via a quest too ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
you can't resize armor once it's made :o/
only thing I know of that can be resized is Crafted Armor (Warrior Quest
stuff) and that's via a quest too
